de.hshannover.f4.trust.ifmapj.metadata

Class IfmapMetadataFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshannover.f4.trust.ifmapj.metadata.IfmapMetadataFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentAuthorizationMetadataFactoryImpl, IcsSecurityMetadataFactoryImpl, StandardIfmapMetadataFactoryImpl

    public abstract class IfmapMetadataFactory
extends Object
    Abstract base class for metadata factories. Provides methods to create Document objects.
    Author:
    Bastian Hellmann

    • Method Detail

      • createSingleElementDocument

        protected Document createSingleElementDocument(String namespaceUri,
                                               String namespacePrefix,
                                               String name,
                                               Cardinality cardinality)
        Creates a metadata document with a single element and given namespace information.
        Parameters:
        namespaceUri - URI of the namespace of the metadata document
        namespacePrefix - prefix of the namespace of the metadata document
        name - value of the root element of the metadata document
        cardinality - the cardinality of the metadata document
        Returns:
        a Document instance representing the metadata object

      • appendTextElementIfNotNull

        protected void appendTextElementIfNotNull(Document doc,
                                          Element parent,
                                          String elName,
                                          Object value)
        Helper to create a new element with name elName and append it to the Element given by parent if the given value is non-null. The new Element will have Text node containing value.
        Parameters:
        doc - Document where parent is located in
        parent - where to append the new element
        elName - the name of the new element.
        value - the value of the Text node appended to the new element, using toString() on the object.

      • createAndAppendTextElementCheckNull

        protected Element createAndAppendTextElementCheckNull(Document doc,
                                                      Element parent,
                                                      String elName,
                                                      Object value)
        Helper to create a new element with name elName and append it to the Element given by parent. The new Element will have Text node containing value.
        Parameters:
        doc - Document where parent is located in
        parent - where to append the new element
        elName - the name of the new element.
        value - the value of the Text node appended to the new element, using toString() on the object. is null
        Returns:
        the new Element

      • createAndAppendElement

        protected Element createAndAppendElement(Document doc,
                                         Element parent,
                                         String elName)
        Helper to create an Element without a namespace in Document doc and append it to the Element given by parent.
        Parameters:
        doc - the target Document
        parent - the parent Element
        elName - the name of the new Element
        Returns:
        the new Element

      • appendElementWithAttributes

        protected Element appendElementWithAttributes(Document doc,
                                              Element parent,
                                              String elName,
                                              String... attrList)
        Helper to create an Element without a namespace in Document doc and append it to the Element given by parent. Further, add all attributes to the newly created Element specified by attrList.
        Parameters:
        doc - the target Document
        parent - the parent Element
        elName - the name of the new Element
        attrList - name value pairs of attributes
        Returns:
        the new Element
